EmailTemplate.description: Email that goes out to those who registered but did not attend. Garrett Zaino. 4/2/2012
EmailTemplate.name: 27Apr12Web: Women.We missed you
EmailTemplate.subject: Since You Missed It... Slides Attached for Webinar on the "Third Path"
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}}, We are sorry you were unable to attend our webinar "The Third Path: Independent Consulting for Entrepreneurial Women" moderated by our CMO, Aassia Haq. We do appreciate you registering, however and would like to share a few resources around the topic with you: Presentation slides <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO-Partners-Webinar-The-Third-Path-Women-Independent-Consulting.pdf> Recorded webinar <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinar-third-path-independent-consulting-entrepreneurial-women> The Third Path Infographic <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/women-and-independent-work.html> State of Independence Workforce Index <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/docs/MBO-Partners-Independent-Workforce-Index-2011.pdf> "Are You Ready to go Solo?" Online Quiz <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/are-you-ready-to-go-solo-quiz.html> We invite you to sign-up to stay informed about future webinars in our series. If you have any topic recommendations or feedback, please email webinar@mbopartners.com <http://info.mbopartners.com/2012SeriesSignUp.html>. Regards, MBO Partners
